title: CropType
description: Agricultural crop types with GAP (Southeastern Anatolia Project) region priorities

gapPriorities.description: GAP region priority crops (ALL 9 crops are GAP priorities - these are the ONLY supported crops)

notes.breaking_change_policy: Adding new crop types is non-breaking (MINOR). Removing or renaming crop types is breaking (MAJOR) and requires migration guide.
notes.gap_region: GAP (Güneydoğu Anadolu Projesi) region includes: Adıyaman, Batman, Diyarbakır, Gaziantep, Kilis, Mardin, Siirt, Şanlıurfa, Şırnak
notes.usage: This enum is used across schemas (Field, Mission, Pricing) and UI components. Always reference this canonical source.
